# Wingman AI
Wingman is a distributed AI agent ecosystem with a CLI control plane and a gateway for multi-agent orchestration, persistent sessions, adapters, and a real-time Control UI. Use Wingman to run agent squads, connect MCP tools, automate routines, and collaborate across CLI, Web UI, and VS Code.

Keywords: Wingman AI, distributed AI agents, multi-agent orchestration, persistent sessions, gateway, agent framework, CLI, Control UI, MCP, Model Context Protocol, skills, hooks, Discord adapter, voice TTS, webhooks, routines, automation, VS Code extension

## Main Page
- https://getwingmanai.com/ : Landing page overview with product positioning and install CTA.

## Sections
- https://getwingmanai.com/#how-it-works : 4-step flow (install, start gateway, connect clients, collaborate) plus architecture diagram.
- https://getwingmanai.com/#features : Feature grid covering durable sessions, multi-agent orchestration, skills/hooks, MCP, voice, Discord, routines/webhooks, auth, and discovery.
- https://getwingmanai.com/#bundled-agents : Bundled agent templates, where they live, and how to customize them.
- https://getwingmanai.com/#finnhub-mcp : Finance MCP capabilities, setup fields, env vars, and research-only disclaimer.
- https://getwingmanai.com/#quick-start : Three command quick start and client options (CLI, WebUI, VS Code).

## Quick Install
- https://getwingmanai.com/install.sh : Installer script that installs the gateway CLI with bun/npm and launches `wingman init`.
- https://www.npmjs.com/package/@wingman-ai/gateway : NPM package for the gateway and CLI distribution.

## Docs and Source
- https://docs.getwingmanai.com/ : Full product documentation.
- https://github.com/RussellCanfield/wingman-ai : Monorepo source and issue tracker.
- https://github.com/RussellCanfield/wingman-ai/releases : Release notes and changelog.
- https://github.com/RussellCanfield/wingman-ai-vscode-extension : VS Code extension source.
